long_description: The Universal Accessory Pack 200 offers an extra set of speakers and mounting hardware so you can use your Force or HBC 120+ controller (sold separately) with a second helmet or goggles. Boomless microphone and patented, beam-forming technology isolate your voice and help eliminate background noise so you can be heard clearly, even in extreme environments. Kit includes two high-fidelity speakers, four mounting brackets, permanent and removable helmet attachment clips, goggles attachment clip and helmet-strap clip. Also comes with an AC/USB charger, two rip-and-stick speaker attachments and a stencil for aligning the microphone.
